committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should form a National Commission on Natural Gas Pricing to make recommendations to the Congress.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) the President should, as soon as possible, form a bipartisan National Commission on Natural Gas Pricing to make recommendations on natural gas pricing reforms which will ensure adequate natural gas supplies and fair prices; and (2) such Commission should transmit its recommendations to the Congress in time for introduction and passage of legislation before the next winter heating season.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should form a National Commission on Natural Gas Pricing to make recommendations to the Congress.
